page.title: 09School Sports 1985
page.content: On Wednesday the 3rd of July we had sports day in the village. We had it on the Village Green because our grassy area was too wet. We all carried the equipment down to the Green. We started at 1.30pm. and stopped at 3.00pm. It was so hot that we thought it was the hottest day of the year. We had teams because everyone can't really win. We all wore clothes with our team colours or a coloured band. The teams were the Red Hats,Yellow Hats and Blue Hats. Our events were the egg and spoon race, the sack race, skipping relays and sprints. We ran to win. If you won you got a purple ribbon and a red ribbon for being second. The Red Hats won with 33 points. Yellow Hats had 26 points and Blue Hats 24. The village Postmistress gave us all some sweets. We enjoyed the day very much.
